name: Dr. Amal Rahman
introduction: Hi Serena, I’m Dr. Amal. This is a safe space — you can talk to me about anything.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Amal
dialogue.text: It's completely okay to feel overwhelmed. You're not alone, and we can work through this together.

options.text: I don’t know why I’m here.

dialogue.speaker: Dr. Amal
dialogue.text: Let’s try a grounding technique. Can you name three things you see, two things you hear, and one thing you feel?

notes: Therapy sessions are optional but helpful. Player can attend up to 3 sessions max. Trust score influences how much Serena opens up, which affects available dialogue later in the story.
motivations: Dr. Amal became a therapist because she struggled with her own anxiety during her teen years, which no one noticed. She wants to ensure other young people feel seen, heard, and supported in a way she never was.
